abstract:
Professor Anne Massie moderates this session. Panelists will speak for 15 minutes each.
Papers presented:
Maya Manian: The Consequences of Abortion Restrictions for Womens Healthcare Lynne Marie Kohm: Roes Effect on Family Law Robin Wilson/Ryan Hrobak: Emergency Contraceptives or Abortion-Inducing Drugs? Empowering Women to Decide for Themselves James Mahon: Innocent Burdens: On Judith Jarvis Thomsons A Defense of Abortion
title: Session 5
subject: law
